resources.string: Dr. Cerzawa, a scientist in the basement, discovers two eggs that belong to an ancient beast called the Moto that nourishes the nuclear radiation. A monster was already out of his egg and the second winged monster also came out of the hatch and escaped by destroying a series facility where it was maintained. The Godzilla with the Uninvited guest will enter the war, which results in the destruction of human technologies and the destruction of a large part of the American cities. Finally, Godzilla can causeneuroprotective destruction. The film is Godzilla as an ancient creature and the Sultan of Monsters.
